entry.title: My Sublime Custom Config
entry.content:
• User Preference:

{ "color_scheme": "Packages/Oceanic Next Color Scheme/Oceanic Next.tmTheme", "folder_exclude_patterns": [ ".svn", ".git", ".hg", "CVS", "tmp/*.tmp" ], "font_size": 12, "ignored_packages": [ "Vintage" ], "save_on_focus_lost": false, "tab_size": 4, "theme": "Seti.sublime-theme", "translate_tabs_to_spaces": true, "trim_trailing_white_space_on_save": true }

  • User Key Bindings

[ { "keys": ["command+shift+f"], "command": "reindent"} ]
